alert.note: Alert for Sullivan (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 27 at 4:12PM EDT until July 27 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Sullivan County in central New York... Lackawanna County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Southern Wayne County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Northern Luzerne County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Central Pike County in northeastern Pennsylvania... Wyoming County in northeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 412 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from South Fallsburg to near Lackawaxen to Archbald to Kasson Brook, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Scranton, Falls, Dunmore, Fallsburg, Carbondale, Old Forge, Pittston, Archbald, Monticello and Blakely. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Heavy rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
